text: Kulaŋ 11.32 Mt 14.5, Mk 6.20 iamɨgali sɨkasɨkan agɨlaŋ nɨman abahɨdavi uavɨmalɨ. Jon nɨbu Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ igalakalaka hɨsɨŋ kulaŋ aba abahɨdavi uavɨmalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨlasaŋ lɨda nɨman abavɨmalɨ. Alaŋ nɨman abɨmaga uavɨmalɨ. Kulaŋ agɨlaŋ Jon saŋ ibi iguavɨci avɨli hɨvɨ kulaŋ iamɨgali agɨladɨ mɨŋamɨgu mɨŋaiakalɨ aba abɨmaga uavɨmalɨ.
